headline.main: Three New Dog Breeds Added to American Kennel Club List
headline.print_headline: Three New Dog Breeds Added to American Kennel Club List

docs.snippet: A French farm dog, a miniature herder and a curly-haired truffle hunter have been added to the list of pure-bred canines maintained by the American Kennel Club, the New York-based organization said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A French farm dog, a miniature herder and a curly-haired truffle hunter have been added to the list of pure-bred canines maintained by the American Kennel Club, the New York-based organization said on Monday.

headline.main: Stocks sell-off as Greek debt talks stall
headline.sub: Stocks sell-off as Greek debt talks stall

docs.snippet: Breakdown in Greek debt talks weigh on the markets, major indices end the day lower. Dow enters negative territory for the year. Shartia Brantley reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Breakdown in Greek debt talks weigh on the markets, major indices end the day lower. Dow enters negative territory for the year. Shartia Brantley reports.

headline.main: Taylor and Newgarden Prove American Racers Still Have a Shot
headline.print_headline: Taylor and Newgarden Prove American Racers Still Have a Shot

docs.snippet: Jordan Taylor stood atop the podium at Le Mans, surveyed the massive crowd below him, and thought of only one thing to scream....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan Taylor stood atop the podium at Le Mans, surveyed the massive crowd below him, and thought of only one thing to scream.

headline.main: 390,000 People Tied to DHS May Have Had Data Breached
headline.print_headline: 390,000 People Tied to DHS May Have Had Data Breached

docs.snippet: The Homeland Security Department said Monday that the private data of as many as 390,000 current and former employees, contractors and job applications may have been compromised in a newly disclosed computer hack....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Homeland Security Department said Monday that the private data of as many as 390,000 current and former employees, contractors and job applications may have been compromised in a newly disclosed computer hack.

headline.main: New York Rent Regulations for 2 Million Tenants Expire
headline.print_headline: New York Rent Regulations for 2 Million Tenants Expire

docs.snippet: A law affecting rents paid by 2 million New York City tenants expired late Monday as state lawmakers failed to reach an agreement on extending it before a midnight deadline....
docs.lead_paragraph: A law affecting rents paid by 2 million New York City tenants expired late Monday as state lawmakers failed to reach an agreement on extending it before a midnight deadline.

docs.snippet: In a story June 15 about Microsoft's E3 presentation, The Associated Press mistyped the website employing Mikiyah Quinn. The correct spelling is TiCGN.com....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story June 15 about Microsoft's E3 presentation, The Associated Press mistyped the website employing Mikiyah Quinn. The correct spelling is TiCGN.com.

headline.main: LeBron Confident Cavs Can Hold Off Warriors, Force Game 7
headline.print_headline: LeBron Confident Cavs Can Hold Off Warriors, Force Game 7

docs.snippet: Wearing a leather Cavaliers cap and a steely look, LeBron James used his postgame platform to proclaim that he's "the best player in the world."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wearing a leather Cavaliers cap and a steely look, LeBron James used his postgame platform to proclaim that he's "the best player in the world."

headline.main: Virginia Man Pleads Guilty to Attempted Espionage Charge
headline.print_headline: Virginia Man Pleads Guilty to Attempted Espionage Charge

docs.snippet: A 35-year-old Virginia man has pleaded guilty to attempted espionage for providing schematics of an aircraft carrier under construction to someone he believed was an Egyptian intelligence officer....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 35-year-old Virginia man has pleaded guilty to attempted espionage for providing schematics of an aircraft carrier under construction to someone he believed was an Egyptian intelligence officer.

headline.main: Amnesty Says World Neglects Syrian Refugees' Plight, Urges More Open Borders
headline.print_headline: Amnesty Says World Neglects Syrian Refugees' Plight, Urges More Open Borders

docs.snippet: Amnesty International criticized on Monday what it said was a "dismal" global response to the plight of Syrian refugees and urged neighboring countries struggling to cope with the influx of refugees to lift "deeply troubling" measures designed to ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Amnesty International criticized on Monday what it said was a "dismal" global response to the plight of Syrian refugees and urged neighboring countries struggling to cope with the influx of refugees to lift "deeply troubling" measures designed to keep them out.
